name: 英文（二）

restrict: ◎第一階段需人工加選◎第二階段需人工加選◎加退選階段需人工加選 ◎必須先修過【英文(一)】
description: 共同科英文（二）課程為一學期兩學分課程，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 1. 增進學生英語溝通表達能力 2. 透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神 3. 透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野 4. 透過課堂討論培養批判精神 5. 提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
**Freshman English for Non-English Majors (Lower-Intermediate, Spring 2019)**

**10:20-12:10, Monday at B103**

Instructor: Hsu Hsiao-Ling
--------------------------

Email: [hlhsu@ntnu.edu.tw](mailto:hlhsu@ntnu.edu.tw)
----------------------------------------------------

Office: Common Core Education Committee, 3rd floor Administrative Building

Office Hours: By appointment (Monday 13:00~15:00; Friday 13:00~15:00)

**Course Description:**

This general English course is designed to enhance students’ reading, writing, listening and speaking skills. Students will be offered the opportunity to develop these 4 language skills along with critical thinking skills by presenting them with ideas from all over the world.

**Textbook**:

Stephenson, H. Lansford, L. & Dummett, P. (2016). _Keynote 4_. Boston, MA: Cengage Learning Publisher.

(Available at 師大書苑; 02-83695556~8;台北市和平東路1段182-3號2樓)

**Articles for required reading:**

Unit 4 How to spot a liar

Unit 9 Robots that fly

Unit 10 Five ways to listen better

Unit 12 Dare to disagree

**Grading Policy:**

Attendance                                                              10%

Video Presentation (group work)                           10% (select a date)

Reader theater (group work)                                  20%

Formal play(group work)                                       25%

Quiz (individual work)                                           15%

Lexile projects (individual work)                          20%

**Attendance and Participation (individual work)**

Punctual attendance and active participation are required. If you are habitually late or absent, points will be deducted and you may fail this course. If you have to miss a class, please inform me in advance. Participation also includes teamwork and group projects.
